title.en: Houkago, Sensei to Koi ni Ochiru

altTitles.ja-ro: Houkago Sensei to Koi ni Ochiru
Houkago, Sensei to Koi ni Ochiru

altTitles.ja: 放課後、先生と恋に堕ちる

description.en:
Story 1 - Houkago, Sensei to Koi ni Ochiru  
Nozomi lied about her age and is working part time. She was in an extreme bind when she was seen by Sawamura Sensei! But sensei permitted Nozomi to work there. This is the beginning of a secret relation with sensei. When Nozomi is with sensei her heart beats faster. Is this sensation… what you call love? But is the reason why sensei is so nice to her because she's his student..!?  
  
Story 2 - Ururu de Hanikami  
Yuiki wants to spend Christmas Eve with her boyfriend, but will her efforts to spend more time with him drive them apart?  
  
Story 3 - Renka  
A high school girl may be the heir to an ability to predict the future, but will accepting her destiny mean renouncing love?  
  
Story 4 - Himegimi Kakuemi  
Tomboy Kaede has always protected her friend, but now he wants her to see him as a man.  
  
Story 5 - Kare Kano Shigan  
Misora has been pursued by the younger Souta since he was in elementary school. She promised to give him a chance once he reached middle school, but will she keep her promise?
description.pt-br: Nozomi mentiu sobre sua idade para trabalhar depois da escola, mas é descoberta pelo Sawamura Sensei! Ele acaba permitindo que ela continue trabalhando. O começo de uma relação secreta com sensei. Mas quando ela está com ele, seu coração bate mais rápido!! O que Nozomi fará?!
